column5: Starting Jan this year, I have really started to fine tune my crappie fishing through ice. If I can only share one tip to everyone, it would be downsize everything! 2LB test, UL rod, sensitive spring bobber indicator and very small jig hooks.    Fished family day weekend, a huge muskie came interrupt my pan fish action. Caught the beast on my video camera, the fish looked HUGE down the hole, especially when I was fishing 6' FOW.
That was cool. It was like watching a submarine go buy.
How cool is that video, thanks for sharing.  Nice mess of crappie too
Great under water footage young_one and nice crappie collective too Thanks for sharing Leechman
Very cool to see that, great catch of fish too!  Thanks for sharing,  MTBF
what, you didn't try and up your biggest fish caught on 2lb test?
Nice  I bet the crappie fishing slowed down while he was in the neighborhood !!!
wow how cool is that?  beauty fish, and the crappies aren't too bad either
wow , cool video, thanks for sharing !!
